remarks: Reflexivity law for three-place congruence.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Apr-2019.)
statement:
tgcgrxfr.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
tgcgrxfr.m $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
tgcgrxfr.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
tgcgrxfr.r $e |- .~ = ( cgrG ` G ) $.
tgcgrxfr.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
tgbtwnxfr.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
tgbtwnxfr.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
tgbtwnxfr.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
cgr3id $p |- ( ph -> <" A B C "> .~ <" A B C "> ) $.
